channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16978] HoS: add current thread ID to the log redirector for the RemoteDriver
item.description: The log redirector currently doesn't include the thread ID. In case there are multiple sessions running concurrently, it's hard to tell which redirector belongs to which session.
item.summary: HoS: add current thread ID to the log redirector for the RemoteDriver

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12874771 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Thanks for working on this, csun. The patch looks fine. However, I feel that we don't need the childId as part of the thread name. It's always 1 anyways. We can remove the counter completely.
Yes, the counter can also be removed. Uploaded v2.
Looks good. It seems the variable childIdGenerator can be removed from the class.
